WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I am creating a touchscreen keyboard using WPF. The keyboard should be supported for number of languages.
So my keyboard should show language dependent keys . For e.g.....when i change my system language to german, then german keyboard should appear instead of normal English keyboard.
The same feature is implemented in windows On screen Keyboard.
Could anyone suggest me a way to achieve this.
 
Thanks
 
 
Cheers,
Sumit
